solution_line_template: He bought enough grass seed to cover {coverage_per_bag} * {num_bags} = <<{coverage_per_bag}*{num_bags}={total_coverage}>>{total_coverage} square feet.
Thus, the leftover grass seed can cover {total_coverage} - {lawn_area} = <<{total_coverage}-{lawn_area}={leftover_coverage}>>{leftover_coverage} square feet.
